articles.title: Army official ‘not happy’ with GD-OTS’s handling of 155mm contract as production lags
articles.title_tr: Army official ‘not happy’ with GD-OTS’s handling of 155mm contract as production lags
articles.summary: “I anticipate you will see an investment from the company themselves, from the industry partner themselves, to ensure they can continue to build out that facility that would make rounds that would primarily be supported by the [foreign military sales],” Army acquisition czar Brent Ingraham told lawmakers.
articles.summary_tr: “I anticipate you will see an investment from the company themselves, from the industry partner themselves, to ensure they can continue to build out that facility that would make rounds that would primarily be supported by the [foreign military sales],” Army acquisition czar Brent Ingraham told lawmakers.
articles.long_summary: “I anticipate you will see an investment from the company themselves, from the industry partner themselves, to ensure they can continue to build out that facility that would make rounds that would primarily be supported by the [foreign military sales],” Army acquisition czar Brent Ingraham told lawmakers.
articles.long_summary_tr: “I anticipate you will see an investment from the company themselves, from the industry partner themselves, to ensure they can continue to build out that facility that would make rounds that would primarily be supported by the [foreign military sales],” Army acquisition czar Brent Ingraham told lawmakers.
why_important: Ulusal veya bölgesel güvenlikle ilgili olması

articles.title: Exclusive New Mortal Kombat II Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2026
articles.title_tr: Exclusive New Mortal Kombat II Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2026
articles.summary: Karl Urban joined IGN Fan Fest 2026 today to introduce the brand new Mortal Kombat II trailer. It shows our boy Johnny Cage (Urban) looking pretty unhappy at a fan convention, before finding himself battling other realms in a fighting tournament.

articles.title: Özgener’den finansal sıkılıkta üretim gücü olan firmalara destek önerisi
articles.title_tr: Özgener’den finansal sıkılıkta üretim gücü olan firmalara destek önerisi
articles.summary: İZTO Başkanı Mahmut Özgener, finansal sıkılık döneminde nakit akışı bozulan ancak üretim kapasitesi güçlü firmalar için performans kriterine bağlı geçici likidite destekleri oluşturulmasını önererek, verimlilik ve teknoloji yatırımlarını önceleyen, seçici ve dönüşüm odaklı mikro politikaların devreye alınması gerektiğini belirtti.

articles.title: Neve Campbell Insists Scream 6 Salary Offer Did Not 'Value' Her Legacy — but It Sounds Like She Got a Big Payday for Scream 7
articles.title_tr: Neve Campbell Insists Scream 6 Salary Offer Did Not 'Value' Her Legacy — but It Sounds Like She Got a Big Payday for Scream 7
articles.summary: Scream 7 is almost here, and it’s clear that some fans are thrilled to see Neve Campbell’s Sidney Prescott back in the hot seat after she was famously absent in the previous installment. But for Campbell, the choice was clear: there was no way she could return to the franchise in 2022’s Scream 6 because her salary offer didn’t reflect the 25 years of dedication she felt she gave to this story.
articles.summary_tr: Scream 7 is almost here, and it’s clear that some fans are thrilled to see Neve Campbell’s Sidney Prescott back in the hot seat after she was famously absent in the previous installment. articles.title: Şi ve Merz'den küresel istikrar için işbirliği çağrısı
articles.title_tr: Şi ve Merz'den küresel istikrar için işbirliği çağrısı
articles.summary: Şi Cinping ile Friedrich Merz, Trump'ın tarife politikaları ve tek taraflı adımlarının küresel dengeleri sarstığı bir dönemde, çok taraflılık, serbest ticaret ve küresel istikrar için işbirliği çağrısında bulundu.

articles.title: Assassin's Creed Game That Apparently Lets You Possess A Cat Loses Creative Director Clint Hocking
articles.title_tr: Assassin's Creed Game That Apparently Lets You Possess A Cat Loses Creative Director Clint Hocking
articles.summary: Ubisoft has confirmed that Clint Hocking, a Ubisoft veteran who was most recently the creative director on Assassin's Creed Codename Hexe, has left the company.A spokesperson for Ubisoft told VGC that the company sincerely thanks Hocking for his "vision, creative contributions, and dedication over the years.""We wish him the very best in his next chapter," Ubisoft added.Continue Reading at GameSpot
articles.summary_tr: Ubisoft has confirmed that Clint Hocking, a Ubisoft veteran who was most recently the creative director on Assassin's Creed Codename Hexe, has left the company.A spokesperson for Ubisoft told VGC that the company sincerely thanks Hocking for his "vision, creative contributions, and dedication over the years.""We wish him the very best in his next chapter," Ubisoft added.Continue Reading at GameSpot
